text: Atrivim Ahas arazir kurar bar avɨribagh ami, ezɨ Judan gumazamiziba uaghan Ikiavɨra Itir God, men ovavibar God, akɨrim ragha a gasara. Kamaghɨn amizɨ, God Sirian atrivim ko an mɨdorozir gumaziba amangizɨ, me iza Ahas ko an mɨdorozir gumazibav sogha me abɨra. Egha Siriaba, Judan avɨriba inigha ghuzɨ, me Damaskusɨn kalabuziabar mɨn iti. Ezɨ gɨn Ikiavɨra Itir God, Israelian Atrivim, a Remalian otarim Peka amadazɨ, a uan mɨdorozir gumaziba ko iza, Ahas uan mɨdorozir gumaziba ko me mɨsogha me abɨra. Egha men 120,000plan mɨdorozir gumazir gavgaviba, aruer vamɨran me mɨsoghezɨ, me ariaghire.
